page.title: 06Home Life
page.content: We asked some children in our block what pets they had . They mostly had dogs and hamsters came next.The dogs were fed on meat and the hamsters on hamster food ,the dogs were fed once a day and the hamsters twice .We asked the children about gardens too.They mostly had daffodils and roses.They had lots of trees and here are some of them ,willows,fir and a larch.We asked the children about what food they ate. They mostly grew carrots and peas and they mostly ate cereal for breakfast. They had a mixture of gas and electric cookers. The most popular fruit was apples and only one person ate oranges.
